com.comphenix.protocol.error

Class RethrowErrorReporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.comphenix.protocol.error.RethrowErrorReporter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ErrorReporter

    public class RethrowErrorReporter
extends java.lang.Object
implements ErrorReporter
    Represents an error reporter that rethrows every exception instead.
    Author:
    Kristian
